content: I've been thinking about my spending habits lately, and I realized that I used to splurge on luxury items like that Givenchy gown from Neiman Marcus, but now I'm trying to be more frugal and focus on what truly adds value to my life. What do you think about the concept of "investment pieces" in fashion? Do you think they're worth the splurge, or are they just a way to justify overspending?
